name: Koi Zen: Opposite Colors
description:
Embark on a beautiful and minimalist journey that promises to provide a serene experience, allowing you to unwind and relax.

Navigate through a myriad of colors and conquer intricate puzzle levels that progressively challenge your skills. Take control of both the white and black pieces to paint the board with amazing colors. However, be mindful as the white piece obediently follows your commands, while the black piece moves in the opposite direction simultaneously.

And you cannot mix the colors!



Indulge in the presence of a diverse collection of a dozen exquisite koi fish, each one meticulously designed to embellish your game and create a visually captivating atmosphere.



Discover the perfect balance between tranquility and mental stimulation in this mesmerizing puzzle game. Can you unravel the mysteries of each level with your strategic moves?



Experience the allure of Koi Zen: Opposite Colors now!
